Package org.jfree.chart.axis

Class AxisSpace

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.axis.AxisSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
public class AxisSpace
extends Object
implements Cloneable, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable, Serializable
A record that contains the space required at each edge of a plot.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AxisSpace()
    Creates a new axis space record.
